title: How to Pick Between Two Passions or Opportunities
description: Are you multi-passionate? Having a hard time choosing between 2+ options or passions? In this episode, Jordan gives a 5 step framework to help you confidently make a the choice that’s best for you!    For even more, sign up for the free training here:  http://bit.ly/geniuszonetraining
author: matt@jordanleedooley.com (Jordan Lee Dooley)
